#Release Notes for ExifLibrary

= Release Notes =

== v0.4 Pre-Alpha ==

=== Bug Fixes ===

  * Fixed a bug when writing an empty APPn section wrote the section marker where it should skip the entire section.

=== New Features ==

  * JFIF and JFXX metadata is now fully supported.

== v0.3 Pre-Alpha ==

=== New Features ==

  * JFIF metadata is partially supported.

== v0.2 Pre-Alpha ==

=== Bug Fixes ===

  * Fixed a bug when reading writing an image without metadata threw an exception. Without the metadata the library defaulted to big-endian byte-order instead of platform byte-order.

=== New Features ==

  * JFIF metadata is partially supported.

== v0.1 Pre-Alpha ==

First public release.
